Name: GitLab-CE
Overview: GitLab Community Edition docker image based on the Omnibus package.

Web Interface Port (HTTP).Name: Web Interface Port (HTTP)
Web Interface Port (HTTP).Description: This is GitLab's Web UI port you can access via a web browser.

Web Interface Port (HTTPS).Name: Web Interface Port (HTTPS)
Web Interface Port (HTTPS).Description: This is GitLab's Web UI SSL port you can access via a web browser.

Config Storage Path.Name: Config Storage Path
Config Storage Path.Description: This is where GitLab will store its configuration files (use cache drive).

Application Data Storage Path.Name: Application Data Storage Path
Application Data Storage Path.Description: This is where GitLab will store its application data (use cache drive).

Log Storage Path.Name: Log Storage Path
Log Storage Path.Description: This is where GitLab will store its logs.
